article_title: What we know so far about Beirut explosion.
sentence: Here's  a  quick  recap  of  what  we  know  so  far:  Hamas  has  confirmed  that  Saleh  al-Arouri,  the  deputy  head  of  its  political  bureau,  was  killed  in  the  blast  in  the  Dahiyeh  neighbourhood  of  the  Lebanese  capital  on  Tuesday  night.
